title: Slow Waltz in Cedar Bend
description: The author of the phenomenal New York Times bestseller The Bridges of Madison County once again brings characters and situations with his special blend of lyricism and magic. This is a bittersweet story about two good people who discover that true love, when it comes, is rarely fair, or right--or without pain.Cover photo: Â©Tony Stone Images
